programme.title: Chlapi neplačú II
programme.sub-title: Rodinný seriál SR (2014).
programme.desc: Sebi s Romanom uzavrie prímerie. Gejza nedokáže urobiť nič, čím by odklonil smrteľné nebezpečenstvo, ktoré Paule hrozí, a tak sa rozhodne skontaktovať Romana, aby ho požiadal o pomoc. Paula bude mať v svadobný deň predtuchu, že sa stane niečo zlé.

programme.title: Na nože II
programme.sub-title: Reality show SR (2023)
programme.desc: The Bank: V reštaurácii The Bank v Kolárove panuje totálny chaos! Majiteľ je stavbár a o gastrobiznise nič nevie, odmieta do reštaurácie kúpiť základné potreby a nedôveruje svojmu šéfkuchárovi. Dokáže ich Martin Novák uzmieriť, nájsť v šéfkuchárovi novú chuť variť a urobiť z chaosu fungujúcu reštauráciu? Jarný divácky hit Na nože pokračuje na jeseň 2023 ďalšími premiérovými časťami. V čisto slovenskej verzii formátu Kitchen Nightmares si srdcia divákov okamžite získal renomovaný a viacerými prestížnymi oceneniami ovenčený šéfkuchár Martin Novák, ktorý podával pomocnú ruku problémovým a krachujúcim reštauráciám. Nekládol si pri tom servítku pred ústa a často bol aj poriadne prísnym kritikom. Nie vždy sa však jeho snaha pomôcť stretla s pochopením a častokrát to boli práve majitelia reštaurácií, ktorí v podniku držali zatiahnutú ručnú brzdu. V druhej sérii Martin znova navštívi vybrané gastronomické prevádzky po celom Slovensku a za prítomnosti televíznych kamier sa pokúsi vytiahnuť z problémov tie, ktoré sa z najrôznejších dôvodov ocitli v kríze, alebo dokonca na hranici krachu. Po nejakom čase každú reštauráciu prekvapí svojou návštevou, aby preveril, či naozaj došlo k zlepšeniu a reštaurácii odovzdá nálepku s hodnotením. Na nože je formát plný emócií, pri ktorého sledovaní sa diváci TV Markíza ani túto jeseň rozhodne nebudú nudiť!

programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v novej sérii obľúbenej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Partička
programme.sub-title: Záruka najlepšej zábavy
programme.desc: Petra Polnišová, Lukáš Latinák, Marián Miezga, Robo Jakab a Roman Pomajbo sú absolútni profesionáli, ktorí bez väčších problémov - hoc aj o polnoci, poslepiačky či pospiatky - zahrajú... V podstate úplne čokoľvek! A presne o to v medzičasom už kultovej zábavnej šou Partička ide - nenechať sa zaskočiť hocako absurdne znejúcim zadaním diabolského moderátora Dana Dangla a na veľkú radosť divákov v štúdiu i pred obrazovkami improvizovať ako o život! To, že ide o kráľovsky zábavný test invenčnosti a talentu všetkých zúčastnených, ale aj poriadny záber na ich nervy, napnuté na prasknutie, hádam ani netreba zvlášť zdôrazňovať. Nik si totiž nemôže byť istý tým, čo sa stane a ako celý večer dopadne, ani len oni sami nie!

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Marta. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: Susedia si zaumienili, že nájdu konečne Marte vážnu známosť. Nápadníka Jara si zahrá herec Marián Slovák. Susedia ho predstavia Marte s veľkým očakávaním, že konečne on bude ten pravý muž. Veď presne spĺňa jej požiadavky, starší, sympatický, seriózny, skrátka normálny chlap. Ako však nakoniec vysvitne pre našu Martu je naozaj ťažké nájsť niekoho, koho ešte nepozná. V skutočnosti s milým Jarom už mala dočinenia, takže nič nové pre Martu. Bude to ďalší trapas?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Mikuláš. Komediálny seriál SR (2006).
programme.desc: V najbližšej časti Susedov opäť zahviezdi syn Petra Marcina. Po účinkovaní v Hurikáne (milionár s ružou), či v jednej z epizód Susedia (poslíček s pizzou), uvidíme najnovšie Petra Marcina ml. v úlohe Mikuláša. Ako sused Skotnický chodí po paneláku prezlečený za Mikuláša a navštevuje susedov. Nuž a aký by to boli Susedia bez zápletky a prekvapení. Ildikó si Petra Marcina ml. alias Mikuláša pomýli s Lászloóm, ktorý sa v podobnom prestrojení vybral na mikulášsku detskú akciu do Františkovej horárne.

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Gizka Oňová sa ako profesionálna Svokra vracia na obrazovky s novými príbehmi. O pomoc ju tentokrát prosí Marek (36), ktorému sa rozpadá manželstvo. Jeho žena Silvia mu jedného dňa oznámila, že ho už nemiluje, rozvod však odmieta. Majú spolu štyri deti, ktoré sú dennodenne vystavené hádkam a celú situáciu znášajú najťažšie. Najstarší syn sa dokonca pokúsil o samovraždu. Marek dúfa, že Svokre sa podarí vyriešiť túto ťažkú situáciu a pomôže jeho rodine nájsť pokoj a lásku.

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Nová žena: Vlasto a Andrea chodili spolu už dva roky a plánovali si založiť rodinu. Vlasto však dostal lákavú pracovnú ponuku zo zahraničia a rozhodol sa odcestovať. Netrvalo dlho a s Andreou sa rozišiel. Tá smútok z rozchodu riešila novým vzťahom. Stala sa z nej nová žena...

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Babský večer: Marta je frustrovaná, musí variť, aby si udržala chlapa. Zuzana má tiež všetkého po krk. Rozhodnú sa, že jeden deň v mesiaci bude "babský večer". Šampanské, vodná fajka a striptér! A najlepšie, ak sa to uskutoční ešte dnes. Andrejka musí zrušiť romantickú večeru s frajerom, a Ildikó, musí zorganizovať stráženie Ágoštona Lászlóom a Františkom u Milky, ktorá na nich dohliadne. Zuzana Milku na akciu nechce pozývať, lebo pred dcérou, by sa nedokázala uvoľniť. František s Lászlóom pre Ágoštona a Evana vymyslia program na Lesnej správe. László si pre istotu dá dvojnásobnú dávku nových piluliek na upokojenie. Ako dopadne detský deň na Lesnej správe? Podarí sa Marte zohnať náhradu za striptéra, ktorý ochorel? Aké vedľajšie účinky má predávkovanie sa Lászlóovými tabletkami? Čo na babskej žúrke bez manželov a partnerov robí Martin frajer?! A kto nepozvaný sa tam ešte objaví?

programme.title: Susedia
programme.sub-title: Komediálny seriál SR (2021).
programme.desc: Pytačky: Zuzana má problém - drobné poškodenie cudzieho auta na parkovisku pred domom. Aj Milka má problém: s Gergejom si rozdelili náklady, ale energie a voda čo mal na starosti ostali nezaplatené. Prosí Františka, aby sa porozprával s Lászlóom a vyriešili to. Zuzana sa však “naštartuje" a ide to riešiť ona. Aj Ildi má problém, na parkovisku jej niekto oškrel auto. László sa chystá, že odhalí páchateľa. Keď príde Zuzana s Milkinou sťažnosťou, Ildi preberá iniciatívu a ide vysvetliť Milke, že je to nedorozumenie. Radšej by sa ona mala o Gergeja viac starať a najlepšie by bolo, keby počali spoločné dieťa. Inak si bude Andrejka stále brúsiť zuby na svojho bývalého frajera. Andrejkin nový priateľ - doktor Vojtíšek, nie je žiadna záruka. Andrejka však potrebuje poradiť. Spozorovala náznaky, že Bobík, ju chce požiadať o ruku. Všetci sú opatrní a radia jej vyčkať. Len Ildikó ju chce okamžite presvedčiť, aby povedala áno! Lászlóa a Františka na lesnej správe prekvapí aj doktor, ktorý hľadá radu v rovnakej veci. Bude László proti vlastnému presvedčeniu tlačiť Andrejku a Bobíka do zásnub? Dozvie sa Ildikó, kto jej oškrel auto? Ako to dopadne, ak požiada Bobík Andrejku naozaj o ruku? A prečo sa u Františka koná ďalšie stretnutie o 3 dni neskôr?

programme.title: Farma
programme.desc: Televízia Markíza prináša na obrazovky neuveriteľnú pätnástu sériu obľúbenej reality šou Farma. Tentokrát to na statku bude o „súboji generácií“, kedy o atraktívnu finančnú výhru zabojuje 15 farmárov, rozdelených do troch skupín podľa generácie. Každá sa narodila v inom období a práve Farma ukáže, ktorá generácia na statku uspeje – bude to skupina X, narodená pred rokom 1989, skupina Y – deti 90-tych rokov alebo najmladšia generácia Z, narodená po roku 2000? Fanúšikovia obľúbenej šou sa znovu môžu tešiť na staronové prostredie Považského Inovca, v ktorom sa natáčala 13. séria Farmy, nekompromisnú Alicu, nový typ farmárčenia spojený s množstvo noviniek a výrazne zmenené pravidlá, ktoré prekvapia nejedného farmára. Opäť nebudú chýbať ani napínavé duely či jednotlivé epizódy, v ktorých sa bude striedať smiech, slzy, vtipné i dramatické situácie, a tak ako vždy budú plné nečakaných zvratov. Šou bude divákov aj tento rok sprevádzať obľúbený herec Marek Fašiang a chýbať nebude ani ostrieľaný hospodár Martin Bagar.

programme.title: Love Island III
programme.sub-title: Hľadanie lásky v raji v novej sérii obľúbenej romantickej šou
programme.desc: Slniečko, odhalené telá, morský vzduch a dovolenková atmosféra. Na obrazovky TV Markíza sa vracia Love Island, horúca reality šou plná zábavy, slnka, romantiky a hľadania lásky v známej vile na španielskom ostrove Gran Canaria. Šesť párov vzniknutých počas prvej a druhej série obľúbenej reality šou je spolu dodnes a vytvoriť zamilovaný pár sa pokúsia aj súčasní „singles“ zo Slovenska a Česka, obyvatelia vily tretej série. Budú si nielen užívať krásne počasie a zábavné hry, ale pod dohľadom televíznych kamier budú hľadať lásku svojho života. Diváčky a diváci v „priamom prenose“ uvidia, ako sa mladí ľudia nechávajú opantať láskou, so všetkými vzostupmi a pádmi, so všetkými emóciami, ktoré tento najkrajší cit so sebou prináša. Vzniknuté páry prejdú testom pevnosti svojich vzťahov, pretože každému, kto nebude v páre alebo bude spárovaný účelovo, bude hroziť, že bude musieť šou opustiť. Víťazná dvojica získa rozprávkových 75 000 eur. Zamilované „srdiečka“ prevedie pobytom na ostrove lásky opäť hviezdna moderátorka Zorka Hejdová.

programme.title: Adela show
programme.sub-title: Talkshow Adely Banášovej
programme.desc: Talkshow Adely Banášovej

programme.title: Svokra
programme.sub-title: Gizela Oňová pomáha rodinám, ktoré sa ocitli v ťažkostiach
programme.desc: Gizka Oňová sa ako profesionálna Svokra vracia na obrazovky s novými príbehmi. O pomoc ju tentokrát prosí Marek (36), ktorému sa rozpadá manželstvo. Jeho žena Silvia mu jedného dňa oznámila, že ho už nemiluje, rozvod však odmieta. Majú spolu štyri deti, ktoré sú dennodenne vystavené hádkam a celú situáciu znášajú najťažšie. Najstarší syn sa dokonca pokúsil o samovraždu. Marek dúfa, že Svokre sa podarí vyriešiť túto ťažkú situáciu a pomôže jeho rodine nájsť pokoj a lásku.

programme.title: Susedské prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Kto z koho: Manželia Blanka a Michal s dvoma malými deťmi sa rozhodnú, že predajú byt v meste a odsťahujú na vidiek do domu po Michalovom dedovi. Idylické prostredie sa však zmení vďaka susedovi na utrpenie...

programme.title: Rodinné prípady
programme.sub-title: Seriál SR
programme.desc: Najlepšia: Pätnásťročná Monika je bystré dievča, ale žiaden génius. V poslednom čase sa jej školské výsledky trochu zhoršili, pretože sa zamilovala do spolužiaka Filipa. Jej matka Kata je však až nezdravo ambiciózna a neustále Moniku porovnáva so spolužiačkou. Udalosti zájdu až tak ďaleko, že Monika sa dostane do zúfalej situácie...

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Electric Turtles. The turtles are struck by lightning during a storm, turning them into positively charged projectiles zapping everything they touch and setting off all the appliances in the house. Mike gets locked outside by the raccoons who were freezing their little butts off in their lair. By the time Mike gets back inside all hell has broken loose, but Mike might have figured out how he can get rid of the raccoons and de-electrify the turtles at the same time.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Rescuing Roxanne. Playing with Louise and her doll gives Mike an idea. He decides to stage a rescue mission with the doll from the roof of the Mikkelson's house so he can be a hero and impress Iris. But as he prepares to show Iris that he's a real-life superhero, the racoons arrive and ruin his plans. Mercury falls in love with the doll the minute he lays eyes on it while Freddy sets his sights on her sparkly tiara. Now Mike has a real rescue on his hands, all under Iris's watchful gaze. The stakes couldn't be higher!

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: A Sick Trick. The racoons watch Mike enviously as he makes himself comfortable in his living room. If only they could get a piece of that sweet action. Then Freddy has an idea. He crashes into the bay window and pretends to be injured, forcing the Mikkelsens to take him in. Mike sees through the ruse immediately, but if he's going to unmask the scheming raccoon he's going to have to defeat the imposter without getting himself in trouble for fighting the poor "injured" Freddy.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Camping. An old photo album causes Bean to reminisce about his lovely summers at scout camp as a boy, and sets him planning a night under the stars with Teddy. Purchasing a tent becomes a tricky problem – but nothing will stop him having a good time, even if he has to get the garden shed over the roof of his house.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Chocks Away. When his model aeroplane is blown out of the sky by that of a rival kid, Mr. Bean sets his sights on revenge. Next day, his newly constructed fighter plane, almost ready for take-off, sadly lacks a vital part – and the blinking model shop is shut! No matter. It’s chocks away with Teddy at the controls, fighting for airspace over London N10.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Royal Bean. When Mr. Bean breaks his favourite Royal mug he discovers there's only one place to buy a replacement: Buckingham Palace, home of the Queen of England. When one of Her Majesty's corgis runs off with his teddy, Bean gives chase through secret tunnels… and gets lost.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Young Bean. When did Mr. Bean first meet his teddy bear? Did he really learn to drive his mini at the age of ten? Could he possibly have known his battle-axe of a landlady when she was a sweet and blushing bride? Bean takes us on a journey into the past, answering these questions and giving us an inkling as to what made him the man he is today.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Constellation Prize. Slippy’s attempts to impress his cousins with constellation drawings goes awry, causing them to get lost in a nebula! As the nebula messes with their racers and gadgets, escape becomes hopeless. It’s up to Ella and Madhu to find a way to guide them safely back home!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Space Junk. When Space Junk smashes into their clubhouse, Ella and Slippy set off to fix the problem. While Ella wants to be rid of the junk, Slippy’s determined to reuse or at least recycle it. When Ella is trapped, re-using space junk may be the only way to save her!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Gadget Kid. Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you can’t even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Interstellar Treasure Hunter. Dad gives Ella and Slippy a mysterious Treasure Map of their solar system. When Ella cuts corners as soon as she realizes where the final step is! But when that doesn’t yield them the treasure, she must learn to follow instructions. All of them...

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Speed of Ella. Ella’s super excited to check out the Orion flare stars with her family. She’s been looking forward to it for weeks. But when Madhu asks a favour and Slippy calls her for help, Ella can’t say no and might miss the festival entirely! Can she use science to get there in time?

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: A Snootful. The Lady of the House's cousins, the Van der Snoots, visit with their prize-winning Persian cat, Prancy Van der Snoot. Tom is warned to make sure that Snooty doesn't catch sight of the pesky manor mice, lest she get upset or dirty her snowy white paws chasing the vermin. Tom is on it, but nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Lame Duck. Ginger and Rick have installed a new birdbath, and Little Quacker has taken up residence in it. Ginger forbids Tom from going out in the back and has Rick move Spike's house. The dog and cat soon unite to return Little Quacker to the pond without Ginger finding out they're responsible for sending him packing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: It's All Relative. When Jerry's country cousins visit the Abbey, the cook is convinced Downton is in the midst of a vermin invasion! Cates (the butler) presses Tom into service with the threat of becoming a stable cat otherwise. Tom pursues the cunning, feisty bumpkins, and Jerry, throughout the manor, and they delight in making surprise appearances to Tom in awkward moments.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Vegged Out. Jerry discovers the mysterious phobia cats have toward cucumbers and is inspired to try it out on Tom. After freaking Tom out repeatedly, Butch steps in to counsel Tom and help him overcome his fear, only Butch is far from immune himself. The two encounter more and more trouble as they deal with their phobia.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Lost Marbles. A dim-witted cat walks into the detective agency asking for help. It seems he has lost his marbles: He's the city's champion marble player and has either misplaced his case of lucky marbles, or it's been stolen. The cat is desperate to find them before the big tournament. It's up to Tom and Jerry to retrace the cat's steps and solve this mystery.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Frown and Country. Jerry is feeling lonely and wishes he had a girlfriend. Spike explains spring fever to Tom and they leave him be. Jerry's mood improves when he gets a message from his brawny cousin Muscles, who has fixed him up with his girlfriend's friend for a double date.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Momella Day. Ella always looks forward to Momella Day. And this Momella day promises to be the most interstellar yet, because they are going to see a small but powerful Red Dwarf star!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Martian Chronicles. Priya has arrived from Earth to complete a school project about Mars. Priya is unfamiliar with the planet and a bit nervous about its huge dust storms. Ella, Slippy and Madhu convince her she needs to visit Mars.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Music Song. Join us in class to learn our Do, Re, Mi’s. Let’s sing along!
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Running Battle. It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Egg & Bean. Mr. Bean gets in a flap when a monster turns up in his cake-mix. The good news, though, is that the monster turns out to be a harmless baby bird. The bad news is that it grows into a huge stork and takes over his home. Bean attempts to return it to the wild, and finds teaching it to fly makes his arms ache.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hopping Mad! When the frogspawn in Mr. Bean’s bath hatch out, it’s the last thing his landlady needs, especially when she’s invited the Mayor for tea. Hundreds of angry amphibians decide to invite themselves as well. Bean proves to be no expert at catching slippery green things that won’t stop hopping about all over the blinking place.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Grand Invitation. Mr. Bean meets an aristocratic old lady when he nearly runs over her lapdog with his mini. He’s thrilled to be invited for luncheon at her grand but strangely shabby mansion. Bean is determined to rise to the occasion. He’s so busy with matters of protocol he doesn’t notice that the lady and her sinister butler aren’t quite what they seem…

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Red Light, Green Light
programme.desc: Red Light, Green Light

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The King's Birthday. After discovering that the King has never celebrated his birthday, Alice and Lewis set about finding out what would make him happy. But he’s so obsessed with being a good sovereign that their job proves more difficult than expected. The problem is: his majesty is so used to helping other people at the drop of a hat and bending over backwards for them that he’s unable to do anything for himself! So our two heroes pull out all the stops to make sure the King ignores his “rescue missions” for a while so he can concentrate on finding a hobby of his own.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: A Losing Game! The Queen and King appoint Alice and Lewis to play Kroki-kroka (a kind of mini-golf) on their behalf. But when the King is unfortunate enough to compliment the Queen on her “inability to lose,” she takes umbrage and decides to become the biggest loser of all time!! Even if it means sabotaging the match!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Abracada-Present. In order to get her confiscated skateboard back from the Queen (her aunt), Dinah must give her the “perfect gift.” Easy peasy: it just so happens that Lewis has a gift-making machine! Having said that, in order to manufacture the gift, the girl must use objects that match the Queen’s tastes. And since Dinah is in such a hurry to get her skateboard back, she neglects this fact, making the situation even worse. So much so that the Queen says she’ll keep the skateboard forever! But with Alice and Lewis’ help, Dinah learns more about her aunt, enabling her to come up with a gift the monarch really likes, and retrieve her precious skateboard as a result.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: Wired. Alice decides to accompany Lewis on his trip to deliver vitamins to the Rainbow. It’s a pretty risky operation, involving climbing a very long wire, but Lewis is fearless thanks to his “balance button.” However, when he drops the button halfway, it’s panic all round! In the end, thanks to Alice, Lewis realizes that in order to accomplish his mission, he doesn’t need to recover his “balance button” after all - he merely needs to restore his self-confidence!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Brain Power of Love. The Scarecrow has lost his smarts. He just stammers and stumbles around the scrappy dressmaker Patchwork Girl. Wilhelmina thinks Patchwork Girl must be a witch and traps her to find the secret of stealing brainpower. Dorothy comes to the conclusion that the Scarecrow is a bit dimwitted around the Patchwork Girl because he likes her. Scarecrow's brilliant plan guides the gang in freeing the Patchwork Girl from Wilhelmina's clutches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Jinxed. When Ozma and Dorothy say something at the same time, Dorothy playfully calls out, "Jinx!" Suddenly, Lion, Scarecrow, and Tin Man look somber. "Oh no, Dorothy! You can't say that in Oz!" Dorothy and Ozma have lost their voices! They try charades but are comically bad at it. The group must travel the land of Jibber Jab and meet the Yakity Yaks for the antidote.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Rise of the Nome King. After Dorothy finds the Magic Magnifying Glass, the Nome King tricks her into using it on him. But once he's big enough, the Nome King swipes the Magnifying Glass and makes himself a giant who can take over Oz! When Dorothy and her friends realize that the Nome King is afraid of chickens, they decide to use Billina to frighten the Nome King and reclaim the Magnifying Glass. But how will they go up against someone so big?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: One-Winged Wally. Dorothy and her friends find a one-winged monkey who's run away from home. Feeling sorry for the monkey, Dorothy is determined to get him his second wing and asks for Ozma's help. Ozma tries to use her magic to make him a wing, but they don't seem to be the right ones for this Monkey. The gang has to travel to the crooked magician Dr. Pipt to get the right wing. On the way home, the terrible Wheelers attack our gang. When the monkey goes to save them, he realizes that his unique abilities saved the day.

programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Mike, a refined pug with sophisticated tastes, longs for a quiet life but is instead forced to defend his house from a bunch of furry intruders. Raccoons, turtles and Fluffy the Cat have a knack for showing up at the worst possible moments, dragging Mike into a series of unforeseen twists and turns! After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Wand-erful. There's a storm headed for Emerald City and the only thing that can protect them is one of Glinda's protective bubbles. Unfortunately, Glinda the Good Witch's wand is missing! Dorothy takes a break from teaching Toto "fetch" to help Glinda find her wand. As Dorothy and friends re-trace Glinda's steps, Wilhelmina hears about the lost wand. Wilhelmina is one step ahead, and she gets the wand before Dorothy! Now, it's up to Toto to remember what it means to fetch or else it's curtains for the gang!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: No Sleep Sleepover. Dorothy is teaching Queen Ozma and friends about slumber parties! But Wilhelmina is mad that she's been left out of the fun and tries to ruin the party with a giant Pillow Monster. But not only does the Pillow Monster attack the party, he escapes the Emerald Palace and rampages toward Wilhelmina's castle! With some help from the Patchwork Girl, they unstitch the Pillow Man and save Oz.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Lion Catches a Bug. When the Wicked Witch plots to have her winged monkeys invade the Emerald Forest, everyone turns to Lion – the King of the Forest – to rally his troops. But Lion is feeling under the weather. In Oz, when you catch "a bug," you catch a literal bug! This little guy makes himself at home in Lion's ear, forcing Dorothy to take a magical potion that shrinks Dorothy, Tin Man and Scarecrow down so they can go into Lion's ear and get the bug out and save the forest!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tik Tok and Tin Man. Dorothy and her friends find Tik Tok, a mechanical man, broken down by the side of the road who needs to be repaired! Tik Tok is immediately enamored with Tin Man, thinking he's a great hero. He wants to be just like Tin Man, but since Tik Tok's voice mechanism isn't working, the only way Tik Tok can communicate this is by trying to impress Tin Man. Worried that Tik Tok is going to replace him, the Tin Man's jealously comes to a head when Tik Tok saves the group from the springs of Springfield Mountain. Deciding that he should leave, only Dorothy, Scarecrow and Lion convince him that he can never be replaced.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis II
programme.desc: The Lost Crown. After skidding out of control, the Queen loses her crown a little too long for comfort: as per the official rules, this deprives her de facto of her royal powers. At least now the tables can be turned: she can step into the shoes of her subjects, for once, and find out what it’s like to be a commoner. Or at least that’s what Alice is planning: unbeknownst to Lewis, she has hidden the precious crown on purpose: this little life lesson will do the Queen the world of good!

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

After his owners return, an exhausted Mike finds himself in the dog house once again, missing yet another opportunity to impress Cindy, the neighbor's elegant dog.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Lemmings in Space. The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this 'bear's privilege,' except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: In the pink. Mr. Bean finds himself lumbered with an unwanted pet in the form of a four-legged ball of pink fur with piggy eyes and a penchant for earthworms. Encyclopedias leave him none the wiser as to the identity of the pesky creature but Bean can’t bring himself to just abandon it. The puzzle is eventually solved after a picnic in the park and a raid on the local pet shop.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Dinner for two. Mr. Bean forgets the golden rule: never fall asleep in the bath when you've got a chicken in the oven. So what romantic meal can he quickly rustle-up for his luckless girlfriend, Irma Gobb? The cheese from the mousetrap? The flower from the vase? A meal is eventually provided by an uninvited guest.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Ball. The nasty tennis player is big and angry and wants his ball back. The one Mr. Bean managed to throw on the roof of a house across the road. Paralysed with vertigo sixty feet up on a windowsill, he is eventually brought to earth by the helpful intervention of a neighbour’s pet gerbil.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Toothache. Bean’s sweet tooth leads him to despair when he bites off a bit more than he can chew. He is tormented by the toothache from Hell - and embarks on a hilarious mission to pull out this menace. Bean’s DIY attempts fail to succeed, and he is left with no other choice but to visit the dreaded dentist. But can Bean brave the Dentist’s chair? Or will the dentist despair when faced with Bean’s antics?

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Disappointment. The bugs talk about times they felt disappointed.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Lord Spike. A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.
programme.desc: The iconic cat and mouse rivals are back. The all-new series takes another look at the madcap slapstick and never-ending battle that has made Tom and Jerry two of the most beloved characters of all time.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.sub-title: Disappearing Tom. Tom is tricked into believing he is invisible.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect. It's picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this year's picture.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Visitor. Mr. Bean cannot, for the life of him, place the face of the uninvited fat bloke on his doorstep. An old school photograph and school cap just about jog his memory. By this time his new ‘friend’ has put his feet up and is eating Bean out of house and home. This blast from the past proves to be a blasted pain in the neck.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Big TV. Irma Gobb comes round to watch TV and Bean finds that liking different programmes to your girlfriend can be very bad for a relationship. After an explosive argument the TV blows up, forcing Mr. Bean to invent his own very ingenious form of home entertainment.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Keyboard Capers. Determined to master Beethoven’s symphony, Mr Bean wangles himself a grand piano, a music book, a candelabra and a very patient piano teacher. Liberace, eat your heart out!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Running Battle. It's the start of a Fun Run. Mr. Bean lines-up beside his deadly enemy: the fat bloke who stole his parking space. Fun Run or no, nothing will stop Bean beating this man to the finishing post, even if he has to flag a cab.

Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Toad & Friends
programme.desc: ‘Toad and Friends’, based on Kenneth Grahame’s literary classic, ‘The Wind in The Willows’, is lovingly brought to life in a brand-new animated series for 4-7 year olds in which Mole, Ratty and Toad are joined by Hedge, a young hedgehog with a zest for life.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Diesel Seagull
programme.desc: Diesel Seagull

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Vocal Yokel. Little Quacker develops the ability to sing like Pavarotti. But when Tom plots to use this to win a prize on the "Pets With Talent" TV show, Little Quacker refuses and Jerry covers for him. As things continue to snowball, it's up to Tom to attempt saving the day.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Hamster Hoopla. After Ginger keeps an abandoned pet hamster unbeknown to Rick, Jerry takes its place after the hamster scurries off. However, Jerry soon gets displaced by baby hamsters that keep multiplying. Soon the situation is out of control.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Tuff Shooting. Under-Butler Tom helps the Lord of the Manor have a trouble-free afternoon hunting with his guests shooting skeet, and Tom's only job is to keep handing clay birds to the head butler. But Tom gets distracted when he sees Jerry and Tuffy eating the fabulous spread of food for the Lord's guests! Tom is so mad he abandons his duty and rushes Jerry and Tuffy, leading to an epic chase.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Anger Mismanagement. Inside the house, Tom and Jerry get into a full-on brawl. Steam comes out of their ears as they face off. Just then, Ginger and Rick walk in, grab both by the scruff of their necks, and says they have to learn to deal with their anger. Ginger shoves a copy of an anger management book at them. Spike and Tom both roll their eyes but agree to make an effort.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Vampire State. On the edge of the village of Catsylvania, a bat snatches up Tom by his tail. He is carried off to a castle in the mountains and emerges in a full Dracula cape and fangs. The real Dracula appears and demands a snack. Tom swoops down on a tiny mouse village, scaring the villagers and carrying off a few. An angry mob with torches and rakes call on Jerry Van Mouseling to go rescue their kin.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: It Ain't Over Until the Cat Lady Sings. When Kitty Caterwaul goes missing the night before the opening of her new musical, "Kitty Foiled," her agent begs Tom and Jerry to take on the case. The search leads the detectives backstage, where they encounter chaos and no shortage of people who could have had a motive. Will the clues lead them to a culprit much closer to home?

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: That's so Madhu. Madhu has special presents for Ella and Slippy, to celebrate the anniversary of the day they met. But when Ella and Slippy say they can’t hang out, Madhu is sent off with only Maggie for company

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ghost Story. Slippy has heard a rumour that the abandoned outpost the gang plans to visit is haunted so he brings his ghost detector goggles, just in case! Ella assures him that there are no such things as ghosts, but then odd things begin to happen.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.sub-title: Class Pet Song. JJ and his classmates are getting a new class pet! What is it?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: A Royal Make-over. How does one choose tasteful wallpaper these days? After watching a royal documentary on TV, Mr. Bean decides to decorate his room in the style of Buckingham Palace. If the Queen’s new wallpaper is good enough for Her Royal Highness, then it’s going to be good enough for him. Meanwhile, his landlady, Mrs. Wicket, suffers from illusions of grandeur and crowns herself Queen of the street.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: SuperMarrow. Mr. Bean finds himself in a race to grow a giant marrow with his next-door neighbour. There’s prize money at stake and a chance to get his photo in the papers. And so, as the competition gets tough, Bean’s gardening techniques become more ingenious, unconventional and desperate.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Bean in Love. He’s got her record, the poster and the T-shirt, so when Mr. Bean’s heart-throb, Roxy, is set to sing in concert at the London Palladium, he sets his sights on the only thing that will make his life complete: her signature in his autograph book. A difficult feat but can love prevail?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Double Trouble. Mr. Bean is over the moon when he meets Mr. Pod because both men have so much in common; same shirt, jacket, trousers and underpants. And to top it all, Pod is Bean’s spitting image! Bean falls to Earth with a bump, though, when his girlfriend, Irma Gobb, finds Mr. Pod much better looking than him.

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: If I Only Had Some Brawn. Ozma has created a fun corn maze with a special treasure at the center. Scarecrow thinks that being super strong will impress the Patchwork Girl so he gets a magical "Get Strong Quick" shirt that makes him a beefy hunk – but at the price of his smarts. When the Nome King steals the treasure from Ozma's maze, Scarecrow must get back his smarts to save the day.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: The Beast Royales. It's Musical Monday and the Beasts Royale, the most popular band in Oz, are going to perform! Wilhelmina is their number one fan, so sends Frank and Lyman to kidnap them so they can play for her instead! Dorothy, Tin Man, Scarecrow, Lion and Toto aren't about to let Wilhelmina spoil the party, and mount a hair-raising rescue so that the band can get back to the castle to perform.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Following the defeat of the Wicked Witch of the West, Dorothy Gale has been appointed Princess of Emerald City by Queen Ozma. Faced with obstacles at every turn – from flying monkeys to her arch nemesis, Wilhelmina (the Wicked Witch of the West's niece and protégé) – Dorothy bravely tackles her royal duties with her feet firmly planted in her magical ruby slippers.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Stuck on You. Dorothy presents Ozma with a magical Best Friends necklace (half says best and the other half says friends) that she found while digging in her garden. Ozma is thrilled and puts it on immediately! But what they didn't realize is that the second you put on the necklaces, you're literally joined/connected at the hip! They must find the key to friendship to get unstuck!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

programme.title: Alice & Lewis
programme.desc: Six-year-old Alice has a magical key that leads her to Wonderland. In this “other realm”, she’s met an endearing rabbit, Lewis, and the two have become fast friends – best friends to be exact! Alice loves going to Wonderland and teaming up with Lewis and her other friends, even if it means contending with the whimsical, hot-headed Queen. Each episode entails a visit to Wonderland, where Alice experiences a wacky adventure with Lewis, confronting the crazy, eccentric rules and conventions that reign supreme in this parallel Kingdom. Alice’s adventures always begin in the “real world” where she is faced with a particular situation. Her far-fetched experiences in Wonderland lead her to a positive outcome or gain insight which helps her to resolve this dilemma and thus, at the end of each episode, she returns happily to the real world.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. programme.title: Mighty Mike
programme.desc: Hoverboard. Mike is impressed with Tom's hoverboard tricks and decides to try to master them to impress Iris. As soon as Tom steps out, Mike tries to get his hands on the board but the turtles have other ideas. In fact, everyone seems to want a turn on the hoverboard, including the raccoons. It's the perfect way for them to get their loot from the house to their den. Mike is going to have to step up if he wants to defeat the raccoons and get Tom's hoverboard back.

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Batwheels, a preschool animated action-adventure comedy series starring the most heroic and iconic vehicles from the DC universe. They are a team of incredible crimefighters who have banded together to oppose evil, combat crime and clean up the streets of Gotham City. They are...okay, they're NOT Batman and Robin. They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes. Having just been created by the Batcomputer, our heroes are essentially kids with little to no life experience. Led by Bam (The Batmobile), the Batwheels - Bibi (The Batgirl Cycle), Red (The Redbird), Jett (The Batwing) and Buff (The Bat Truck) - must navigate the growing pains of being a newly formed super team as well as the growing pains that come with just being a kid.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: No Pets. Sometimes Mr. Bean’s Teddy can be no fun at all. Feeling the need for a new friend, Bean buys a parrot. But getting the parrot past his landlady and her one-eyed cat, Scrapper, proves to be no easy task. Next, is trying to get the blasted bird to speak.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Ray of Sunshine. It’s a beautiful day at the beach. Bean breathes in the salty air, bliss - and not another soul in sight. What could possibly spoil his perfect day? Answer: British weather. Mr. Bean finds himself chasing an illusive ray of sunshine across town, over hills and dales, a football stadium and the English Channel.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Birthday Bear. Mr. Bean is shocked when Teddy receives a birthday card from Bean’s girlfriend, Irma Gobb. The bear’s Birthday had completely slipped his mind. And what do you get for the teddy that has everything? A morning in a toy shop, burgers for lunch and a slap up tea party, of course. (But only if you can afford it.)

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Mole. Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels

They're the Batwheels - an awesome group of sentient super-powered crime-fighting vehicles defending Gotham City alongside Batman, Robin, Batgirl and a host of DC Super Heroes.

programme.title: Toad & Friends

programme.sub-title: Talking About Games. The bugs talk about what games they like to play.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Lu & The Bally Bunch - Shorts
programme.sub-title: Talking About Listening. The bugs talk about listening.
programme.desc: Lu is a little ladybird who has just started preschool with her new friends. Together they explore their brand new social lives through play, music, big feelings and even bigger fun.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: The Crystal Contingency. Ella and Tilly’s playtime results in the smashing of precious crystals that are part of Mom’s meticulous experiments. Determined to replace them, Ella battles a pulsar and then a super-hot planet before she realizes her sidelined little sister could be a big help!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Jupiter's Moons. Slippy’s excited to try out his new Rocket Boosters. He’s so excited that he overloads them and becomes stranded on a dangerous moon with Madhu. It’s up to Ella to jog Madhu’s memory so they can find the right moon and save Slippy!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings III
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: At ACME Construction Company, Bugs Bunny and Lola Bunny manage a crew of builders that, quite frankly, should not be anywhere near a construction site. However, by working together as a team, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, Tweety and others use their tools and wild vehicles to pull off some of the looniest construction jobs ever.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Magpie. When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Cat-Sitting. After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Bean’s landlady is rushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isn’t the only thing that flies and in the end it’s Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: The Bottle. Mr. Bean is delighted with his new ‘ship in a bottle’ until it mistakenly ends up on a milkman’s float. He frantically pursues his prize possession, only to see it disappear into a milk bottling plant at the local dairy. Getting it back promises to be a mission of the impossible.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Goldfish. With his teddy bear at the dry cleaners, Mr. Bean finds himself feeling lonely. Fortunately, a new playmate appears in the shape of a goldfish from the garden pond. Bean has a great time with his new best friend until, at the seaside, he discovers that some fish are gigantic, have large pointed teeth and fins on their backs.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: Bugs Bunny Builders is a fun and exciting preschool series featuring your favorite Looney Tunes working at a construction company. Join Bugs Bunny, Lola Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig and Tweety Bird as they use their amazing vehicles to take on the looniest builds ever. Along the way, they’ll learn valuable lessons and never give up because The Looney Builders always get the job done!

programme.desc: Percy and the Skunks

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Saving Mooncake. When Ella borrows Slippy’s luckiest good luck charm, she risks losing it forever when she finds herself at a black hole. It’s only when everyone pools their strengths together that Mooncake is returned to Slippy, safe and sound.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: A Star is born. It’s Ella’s mom’s birthday! Determined to get her mom the bestest birthday gift ever, Ella searches the Galaxy with help from her friends. But with time running out, she’ll have to realize that the best gift of all may not come wrapped in a box...

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Fish Out of Water. Hildie and Beatie return from the Ol' Time Goblin Fair with kettle corn, a giant stuffed warlock, and a piranha they won in the ball toss. Despite their warning not to touch the fish, Tom can't pass up a chance to eat the catch of the day! But first he has to get past Jerry who is determined to protect his new friend. When a failed attempt by Tom ends up with the fish bowl being shattered, Jerry quickly casts a spell with the wand that allows the fish to breathe on dry land! The liberated fish is excited to explore his newfound freedom (walking on his tail fin) and ends up making life a lot more complicated for Jerry who's trying to protect him!

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Someone's in the Kitchen with Mynah. Ginger brings home a new pet—a mynah bird who can mimic anyone and anything. Rick complains about the money they will have to spend to feed and care for another pet. Spike and Tom are on notice, as somebody's got to go.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: When You Leash Expect It. Ginger decides she wants to teach Tom to walk on a leash to ensure he gets much-needed exercise. Tom hates the leash and does not want to go for a walk. Finally, they're on their way, much to Tom's chagrin. Back home, Jerry and Tuffy proceed to raid the fridge.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Don't Cut the Cheese. It's that special time of year when the Lady of the House's rare, exotic (and very stinky) cheese gets delivered to the manor. It's up to Tom to make sure not a crumb of this cheese—known to be a favorite of mice—goes missing.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Calamari Jerry. Ginger leaves some frozen fish on the kitchen counter to thaw. Ginger and Rick warn Tom to keep his paws away, or he will not get anything to eat. Soon, a live baby octopus crawls out of the mouth of one of the thawing fish and jumps off the counter, looking for a place to hide. Jerry befriends him and does his best to protect him from Tom.

programme.title: The Tom and...
programme.desc: Cattyshack. It's time for the annual croquet tournament at the Manor. The butler tells Tom how important it is to the Lady of the Manor to always win…no matter what! The last thing they need is any pesky rodents interfering with the game. Knowing any sighting of Jerry or Tuffy would cast Tom in a bad light, he's determined to keep them off the lawn.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Commander Slippy. The gang is playing tag the Meteoroid when Glitch fails to follow Slippy's instruction. He soon realises it's because Glitch saw the comet he's been tracking for months! Slippy is excited - he gets to tag a comet!

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Earthbound Priya. Ella and Slippy are perfecting their triple corkscrews when Priya, Ella’s best friend from Earth, surprises her with a visit. Priya performs a perfect triple corkscrew to everyone’s amazement. Ella is frustrated that she still can’t nail it

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Welcome CoComelon! In CoComelon, Baby JJ and his family go on fun every-day experiences packed with things to learn and explore. There is always something new to learn in these everyday situations which any pre-schooler can relate to!

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Art thief. During a visit to London's National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean ‘the International Art Sleuth’ prove successful?

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Scaredy Bean. Who's afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. He's very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Bean’s imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Hot Date. Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: The Mr. Bean...
programme.desc: Wanted. Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Bean’s landlady.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends - Shorts XXV
programme.sub-title: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off
programme.desc: Carly and Cranky's Big Lift Off

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings II
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest ranger's house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels it's only natural that the ranger's house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bear's privilege" except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!
